short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to save text snippets from websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quote Keeper is a simple extension designed to help you save and manage your favourite quotes from across the web. Whether you're a student, writer, or just want to save bits from your readings, Quote Keeper makes it easy to bookmark, organise, and revisit things that interest you.

**How to Use**
Install the Quote Keeper extension from the browser store.
Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and select "Save quote to Quote Keeper."
Open the extension popup to view, organise, and manage your saved quotes.
Use the export and import buttons to backup or transfer your quotes.
Start collecting quotes!
